track.name: My Foolish Heart
comments: About as intimate as it gets.
The tenderness.....can you imagine whispering in her ear.
one of the most emotional songs i know. mmm this song means so much to me.
hurra, er spielt so gefühlsvoll. romantisch, es ist eine besondere kunst ;-)

One of Bill Evans most expressive recordings  My Foolish Heart   full of all his feelings and expressive playing 
.
such a classic
emotional ambivalence is captured by this tune
I'm so glad to be human enough to whimper at music like this...!!!!
I love it. It's the best version. Masterpiece !
that unique moment that was catched in the now

Ooh, I could drown My Foolish Heart.. 
igOr OGOGO
Outstanding.  I wish I was in the audience.
my youth....
Yes it is beautiful but I think the Town Hall '66 version is superior
sooooo beautiful - brings tears to my eyes...
i agree with  QuiveringGroove  the drumms are not quite blending with the atmosphere ...
an easy  tune but alive like the breath of life.
Beautiful - Sensivel - Isso é Bill Evans.
like a dream....
Those drum brushes cut right through.
